name: bundle-pipeline-2-allin
description: A seed project for jspm and cssnext
author: Pete Otaqui <pete@otaqui.com>

scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-html && npm run bundle-styles && npm run bundle-js
scripts.bundle-js: npm run bundle-main && npm run bundle-concat
scripts.bundle-all: npm run clean; npm run bundle-deps && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle-main: jspm bundle js/main - react - lodash bundle-main.js --minify
scripts.bundle-concat: cat jspm_packages/system.js > bundle.js && echo "" >> bundle.js && cat config.js >> bundle.js && echo "" >> bundle.js && cat bundle-deps.js >> bundle.js && echo "" >> bundle.js && cat bundle-main.js >> bundle.js
scripts.clean: rm bundle* || echo "No javascript to clean"; rm styles/bundle* || echo "No styles to clean"; rm index.html || echo "No html to clean"
